name: SLiDE (Hyper Casual Game)
description:
Note: 
It is not easy as it looks.
This game is quite hard and addictive so play with your own risk.
Just have fun and enjoy.

Game play mechanics (Dynamic BEST SCORE)
- Touch or hold, left/right side of your screen to balance your character.
- Avoid dangerous spikes as possible.
- Color Shop and Color Pick System.
- 4 Different Power Ups and Upgrade Power Ups System.
- Careful because you might get a negative score.
